title: Between Us
overview: Team always has a sleeping issue before the swimming competition, which makes him unable to make good records and join the national swimming team. Win notices this problem and decides to step in and help. Win knows that Team just wants someone to stay by his side, so he allows Team to sleep in his room. As a result, Team becomes more relaxed before the competition, and his sleeping issue is no longer severe. On the other hand, Win starts to feel for his junior, Team. But due to his family background, Win is a middle child who only knows how to give love but never receives one. He only knows how to treat people equally, making it harder to approach Team. But with the help of his brothers, Win starts to change himself and makes Team know that he is his special one.
